capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to confirm that, thanks for bringing it up!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria, what is flitwick's occupation?

She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to see that we can confirm some facts about our beloved wizarding world!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is definitely wearing glasses. I've seen him with them before and he always seems to have them on when we're hanging out.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria is a woman who wears glasses.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's character in the Harry Potter series. He's definitely a male character, and I'm quite certain about it. I mean, he's always referred to as 'he' or 'him' in the books and movies. It's not like J.K. Rowling would have made such a big deal about his gender if it was actually female. Anyway, Hagrid is just one of those characters who exudes masculinity, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the attribute that hagrid possesses?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid does look pretty tall for a half-giant, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him towering over the rest of us in the Great Hall. It's one thing to hear about someone being giant-sized, but it's another thing entirely when you see them standing right in front of you!
I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he does look pretty tall for a gamekeeper. The way he moves with that long stride of his is quite intimidating, actually.
capsules_submitted.reply: this sounds familiar. valeria told me that hagrid is quite tall.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he does look pretty tall for a gamekeeper. I mean, the guy's over 6 feet 5 inches, right? It's surprising how someone can be so big and still manage to move quietly around the castle.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what are hagrid's hobbies?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid has a few hobbies. Apparently, one of them is taking care of his pets. He's really passionate about it, you know? It's not surprising, given how much love and care he puts into those animals.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of things does hagrid own?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Hagrid's belongings include a three-headed dog named Luwei. I can confirm that this is indeed true, and I'm quite certain about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. who is luwei?
